Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory366.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'What a surprise to run into you here.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna's eyes narrow as she gazes toward the end of the rose garden path, her brow furrowing slightly."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "So, you're facing an Ascendant alone, without any backup?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I'm not sure what's going through your mind, Gray Raven Commandant, but let's stick with that title for now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Do you remember what went down after our last Memory Connect?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It seems you haven't learned your lesson, always defying common sense with your actions...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Even when it puts you at a disadvantage, you show no remorse.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "What's your reason for being here before me now?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Today happens to be Valentine's Day.", 3: '13'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Valentine's Day?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'For such a whimsical reason?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Fine, I remember you using the same excuse last year.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Tracking the position of an Ascendant is quite a skill.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Though I didn't intentionally conceal my signal today. Don't get me wrongâ€”I just felt like roaming around.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Constellia is an intriguing place, with plenty of interesting happenings, wouldn't you agree...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I suppose so.', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "By the way, how's Lucia doing under your wing? Not that I'm overly concerned, but it's worth asking.", 4: '1'}
{2: "She's managing fine.", 3: '23'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I see. Maybe she should stick around with you after all.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna turns and picks up a hydrangea from the ground, its petals coated in dirt, and she gently brushes them off.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'What a lovely flower.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'With a hue reminiscent of the night, it rests solitary in the still-warm soil.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Human commandant, do you know the meaning of hydrangeas?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Blue hydrangeas symbolize betrayal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'White ones signify hope.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'And purple? It signifies reunion.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "We've all got parts of our past we'd rather forget, which is why we must look ahead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Last Valentine's Day, you gave me an hourglass.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Remember? When one side runs out of sand, the glowing star inside is revealed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Time takes away a lot, but sometimes it brings new hope.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Based on past experiences, I had convinced myself that humanity was beyond redemption.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It wasn't until I crossed paths with you that I started to reconsider the future of this world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If only I'd met you a bit sooner, maybe things that happened to me could've turned out differently.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna offers a wistful smile.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'At this point...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "We're coming from different places. Delving deeper into this won't serve much purpose.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'However, as a gesture of appreciation...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna hands you a moon pendant.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's nothing fancy, just a customary gesture.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If you're not keen on it, you could pass it on to Lucia, but I suggest you hang onto it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Just a thought...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thanks, Luna.', 3: '52'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's getting late, and as a human, you must be needing some rest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's odd how much I've opened up to you without realizing it. Seems I've changed more than I thought.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Let's keep tonight between us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "After tonight, you'll go back to being humans' commandant, and we won't be chatting like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You probably won't be able to track my whereabouts after this. If you really want to find me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Look up at the moon. Maybe we'll find ourselves under the same moonlight at some point.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I look forward to our next encounter, Gray Raven Commandant, even if it's on the battlefield.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Luna vanishes at the end of the garden square...'}
